articles.description: The White House denied the report that it was nearing a deal with Iran, helping oil prices pare recent losses to just above $70 per barrel.
articles.content:
US crude oil prices plunged as much as 5% to below $70 per barrel on Thursday after media reports suggested that the US was making progress towards a nuclear deal with Iran.
The swift decline briefl… [+1823 chars]

articles.author: Morgan Sung
articles.title: Bluesky’s growing pains strain its relationship with Black users - TechCrunch
articles.description: Bluesky is facing increased pressure to crack down on hateful and violent rhetoric, even though robust moderation conflicts with its decentralized goals.
articles.content: Bluesky, the decentralized social network and frontrunner alternative to Twitter, has been hailed as a wonderland of funny posts and good vibes. But a moderation policy change that followed a death t… [+10842 chars]
